title: 1000th win. :)
body: Hey I'm now on 999 wins and it seems to be a bit of a trend to ask Rioters if they want to play with you for your 1000th, so if there are any Rioters with a bit of free time i was wondering if you might want to help me play a game or two to get my 1000 win? :)

replies.body: Hey man congrats on all the wins :)
Add me in game I'll play!
I have added you In game, sorry of the wait, let me know if you still want to play ^^

Thanks for that :)
I've just left for work now, but I'll be back at around 8:00 pm NZ time, If you still are able then or later, that would be great :) but if that doesn't suit, we can play another time when you can ^^
Thanks for declining my game invite mate. GJ
